open

public boolean open()
Open the database connection (with pooling) This open requires that the DB pooling has been properly configured and that your application/utility is running under Tomcat (or equivalant Java container)

Returns:
True if successful

open

public boolean open(java.lang.String db_host,
                    java.lang.String db_name,
                    java.lang.String db_user,
                    java.lang.String db_password)
Open a direct database connection (no pooling)
This version of the open command can be used outside of Tomcat

Parameters:
db_host - DB host server name
db_name - Db name
db_user - User name
db_password - User password
